name: ROOTS – Robotics in Tuscany
legal: None: Network of research centers without a legal status
goal:
ROOTS-Robotics in Tuscany has been created by researchers from Scuola Superiore di Studi Universitari e di Perfezionamento Sant'Anna, Università degli studi di Firenze, Università di Pisa, Università degli studi di Siena.
This network initiative is aimed to catalyze the interests of roboticists in Tuscany, ranging from research centers to small and medium enterprises or industries, for exploiting the large potentials Tuscany has in robotics.
interests: Communication, Education, Enterprise, Environment, Information Society, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: 6 FET Flagship Candidates, “Robot Companions for Citizens”,  led by Scuola Superiore di Studi Universitari e di Perfezionamento Sant'Anna (Paolo Dario) and by the Italian Institute of Technology, with the participation of other scientists and institutions located in Tuscany.
